form.p: Please select what you would like to do.

label.for: Are You Registered with a Professional Body?

div.label: Are You Registered with a Professional Body?

label.for: Are You Registered with a Professional Body?

div.label: Are You Self Or Company Sponsored?

div.h3: Courses currently being loaded. Please return in 6 hours to generate your quote/and or enroll. If urgent, kindly download manual form here and submit so we can generate your quote and email back. Please allow 24 hours to receive quote. Thank you for your patience.

div.t-att-class: 'tab-pane fade in active' if counter == 1 else 'tab-pane fade in'

tr.th: Requirements (All discounts must be verifiably claimed and included in the free quote or final invoice prior to making the first payment or will be forfeited).

tr.t-if: each_discount.discount_type != '1' and each_discount.discount_type != 'combo_2' and each_discount.discount_type != 'combo_3' and each_discount.discount_type != 'combo_4'

tr.td: % All Inclusive Discount (Subject to terms and conditions)

div.label: * Do you require an invoice to be generated ?

tr.td: Please use the dropdown arrow to select the deposit % you would like to pay. Minimum Deposit to enroll is 20% of your total fees (i.e. 20% of your net proforma invoice fees as quoted after applying all the discounts you may be eligible for as a self-sponsored student).
Please use the dropdown arrow to select no. of months to be displayed on your Free Quote or invoice/statement to be emailed to you.
Based on the % deposit and no. of months you selected above, the value on the left will display on your Free Quote or invoice/statement to be emailed.
Using the dropdown, please select the preferred date for the debit orders.

tr.th: Your Account Details for Debit Orders

tr.td: Please enter your bank account details where the Debit Orders will be run.
Please note that the system will validate and authenticate your banking details provided.

div.label: I accept Debit Order Terms and Conditions
I accept the Terms and Conditions
* Do you require an invoice to be generated ?
* Where did you find out about CharterQuest?
I accept the Terms and Conditions

td.div: Before ACCEPTING this Enrolment Form, students are reminded to ensure that they have clearly understood all the terms of their enrolment With CHARTERQUEST, in particular clauses concerning refunds, deferments, waivers, course transfers and visa applications (when applicable).

div.div: Warning! Please make sure all Fields are filled in

t.h3: See below banking details. Ensure you use your unique reference number below. Bank deposits may attract bank charges, ensure you cover any charges related to your transaction.

center.button: Get Quote and Banking details Emailed

t.h3: Log onto your online banking and make payment using the details below and then click the I’ve Paid button below.

tr.td: The CharterQuest Professional Education Institute (Pty) Ltd

t.td: Please do not modify, use the reference/beneficiary text exactly as shown.

tr.td: Please enter the amount to be paid exactly as shown. Do not round off.
